game.name: Zebra Caring
game.description: Oh no! This lovely zebra got herself into a lot of mess and you are the one who is assigned in this animal game to take care of her and her fluffy fur. You are about to go through two stages in this caring game, first include the part where you clean the dirt and make her skin shine and the other one will complete the whole process by designing a cool new look for this funky zebra who needs fashion guidance.
game.metaTitle: Zebra Caring,  Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Zebra Caring at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: L CLICK OF MOUSE TO CLEN THE ZEBRA AND DRESSUP
